author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r19051 for help text formatting consistency.
* contrib/client-side/svnmerge.py
(command_table): Use single quotes around command example.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix same bug as in r18999 but for dir props.
Passes diff test #24 (diff a prop change on a dir named explicitly).
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/commit.c
(change_dir_prop): Don't ref a NULL value (duh).

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Handle the case where a file exists on trunk but not in the past for
the check_path RA call.  Passes diff test #16 (select diff targets).
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c
(fetch_path_props): If we have a revision, we must work off that revision's
VCC url instead of doing a PROPFIND on the trunk.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Send the correct paths to the diff reporter; always ensure that we
know our repos_root; fix one-line think-o from r19052.
(Allows us to pass the majority of the diff tests.)
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/update.c
(end_report): Work off the source URL and rename vars for consistency.
(svn_ra_serf__do_diff): Make our repos_url our source and adjust other paths.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c
(svn_ra_serf__get_repos_root): Move the repos root cache logic to...
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/util.c
(svn_ra_serf__discover_root): here.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/commit.c
(setup_copy_dir_headers): Fix brokenness introduced in r19052 (use dir->name).

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Implicitly checkout dirs when they are copied.
Passes copy test #25 (wc to wc copy with deleted=true items).
All copy tests now pass.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/commit.c
(commit_context_t): Store a hash of copied entries.
(checkout_dir): If our parent is copied as part of this commit, so were we
and this means that we're implicitly checked out too.
(setup_copy_dir_headers): Implicitly checkout dir assuming our COPY succeeds.
(svn_ra_serf__get_commit_editor): Init ->copied_entries.
